  • Method Details

    • maxLenString

      public static String maxLenString(String str, int maxlength, int shorted, String added)
      use to have a maximum string length view ie "hello world !!!" would be "hello wor..."

      with maxlength 13 and shorted 8 and added "..."

      BENZOICUM ACIDUM 1CH - 30CH

      would equal

      BENZOIC ...

      Parameters:
      maxlength - The maximum string length before truncating the string
      shorted - length the string will be truncated to if maxlength is met
      added - string added to original string if maxlength is met. ie ...
      Returns:
      either full description if its less than maxlength or shortened string if its not
